channel.title: Language info on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Language info on Rusland 1

item.title: The letter Ё
item.description: Yo The sound isn’t hard. It’s like the Yo in York, says the (English) Wikipedia. The Dutch version compares it to the jo in jokken (to fib). Russian sources often give examples like ёжик (jozhik, hedgehog) or ёлка (yolka, Christmas tree).

item.title: Cyrillic
item.description: Three short clips (more under the videos) about the history of Cyrillic. Cyril and Slavic Christianity – Christian History Made Easy (Rose Publishing, 2012, 2 m) Cyril and Methodices (Museum of the Bible, 2017, 1 m)
